metadata.title: CVE-2014-1226 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The pipe_init_terminal function in main.c in s3dvt allows local users togain privileges by leveraging setuid permissions and usage of bash 4.3 andearlier.  NOTE: This vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2013-6876.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1226` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dotmcp - 0.2.2-9
kism3d - 0.2.2-9
libs3d2 - 0.2.2-9
libs3dw2 - 0.2.2-9
meshs3d - 0.2.2-9
s3d - 0.2.2-9
s3d-data - 0.2.2-9
s3dfm - 0.2.2-9
s3dosm - 0.2.2-9
s3dvt - 0.2.2-9
s3dx11gate - 0.2.2-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: s3d package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.2.2-9').
